Trade/Device Name(s): HEMOCHRON® Signature Elite™ Whole Blood Microcoagulation System
Regulation Name(s): Multipurpose system for In Vitro coagulation studies
Analyte(s): Activated Partial Thromboplastin Time (APTT and APTT Citrate)
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): HEMOCHRON® Signature Elite™ Whole Blood Microcoagulation System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for HEMOCHRON Signature Elite Whole Blood Microcoagulation System for point-of-care coagulation testing using fresh or citrated whole blood.
Indications for Use Summary: Battery operated, hand-held instrument performing point-of-care coagulation tests (ACT, APTT, PT) on fresh or citrated whole blood with results displayed as clotting times; intended for use in clinical settings requiring point-of-care coagulation testing.
